name: With Hearts Aglow.
description:
Koko and Ro venture the city trying to find each other.  As the time passes, health decreases for both, so they must run to collect hearts before time runs out.   Koko's pink bar can be filled with Ro's blue hearts, and Ro's blue bar can be filled with Koko's pink hearts.

Ro's loving Koko is restless to reunite with the other half of her heart. Although the ambience of the city streets is mesmerizing, you must not loiter, or its GAME OVER for Koko-Ro.  

Credits: Izzy Rollo (modeler, map design, set dressing), Madhu Ratnakar (game developer, technical animator), Marina Trevino (sound design, character design, 2d animator, UI graphics), Naimisha Parmar (modeler, set dressing)

Softwares used: Unreal engine 5.0, Maya, Blender, Illustrator, Photoshop, Clip Studio Paint, Garageband
